naslov: Nova vila s panoramskim pogledom – Kaštel Novi (Rudine)VIDEO-čitaj op. (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju moderna vila s panoramskim pogledom – Kaštel Novi (Rudine) Na uzvisini mirnog i elitnog dijela Kaštel Novog – predio Rudine – prodaje se moderna, novosagrađena vila iz 2025. godine s impresivnim panoramskim pogledom na more, otoke, Split, Kaštela i Čiovo. - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + pdv od prodajne cijene Osnovne informacije: - Ukupna površina zemljišta: 568 m² - Stambena neto površina: 284 m² - Roof terasa: 114 m² VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=akg86Gayb0o - drugi video kompletnog interijera i tlocrte šaljemo na upit / Udaljenost od mora: cca 2300 m / Nekorištena – potpuno nova i namještena! Raspored: // PRIZEMLJE: Prostrani dnevni boravak s izlazom na terasu,kuhinja s blagovaonicom, jedna dodatna soba (trenutno kao radna ili manji dnevni boravak), kupaonica, sušiona/praonica, spremište, te izlaz na terasu s roštiljem, bazenom (grijani) i sunčalištem. // PRVI KAT: 4 spavaće sobe, 2 dodatne kupaonice (ukupno 4 u kući), krovna terasa (roof terrace): - Površina roof-terrace 114 m² - Priprema za jacuzzi - Prostor za odmor i uživanje s jednim od najboljih pogleda u okolici Dodatne značajke: + Panoramski pogled s prizemlja, prvog kata i posebno s krovne terase + Okružena pretežito novim vilama i prekrasnim zelenilom i šumom s desne strane + Nekoliko privatnih parkirnih mjesta Kuća se prodaje kompletno opremljena i namještena Nikad korištena – idealna za obiteljski život ili turističke svrhe Za više informacija kontaktirajte nas direktno. Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ENG ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For sale modern villa with panoramic view – Kaštel Novi (Rudine) On a hill in a quiet and elite part of Kaštel Novi – Rudine area – for sale is a modern, newly built villa from 2025 with an impressive panoramic view of the sea, islands, Split, Kaštela and Čiovo. - exclusive sale by the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + VAT of the sales price Basic information: - Total land area: 568 m² - Net living area: 284 m² - Roof terrace: 114 m² VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=akg86Gayb0o - we send another video of the ALL interior and floor plan upon request / Distance from the sea: approx. 2300 m / Unused – brand new and furnished! Layout: // GROUND FLOOR: Spacious living room with access to the terrace, kitchen with dining room, one additional room (currently used as a study or smaller living room), bathroom, drying/laundry room, storage room, and access to the terrace with barbecue, swimming pool (heated) and sundeck. // FIRST FLOOR: 4 bedrooms, 2 additional bathrooms (total 4 in the house), roof terrace: - Roof-terrace area 114 m² - Preparation for jacuzzi - Space for relaxation and enjoyment with one of the best views in the area Additional features: + Panoramic view from the ground floor, first floor and especially from the roof terrace + Surrounded by mostly new villas and beautiful greenery and forest on the right side + Several private parking spaces The house is sold fully equipped and furnished Never used - ideal for family life or tourist purposes For more information, photos, floor plan and to arrange a viewing - contact us directly. Dear clients, viewing of the property is only possible with a signed mediation agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on mediation in real estate transactions. #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
